actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate to establish an Office of Assistant Secretary for Emergency Energy Preparedness.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Energy should immediately establish an Office of the Assistant Secretary for Emergency Energy Preparedness responsible for planning, coordination, and implementation of the emergency response programs of the Department of Energy.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate to establish an Office of Assistant Secretary for Emergency Energy Preparedness.
